name: AnimalCircle
description:
Game for Kenney Jam 2022.

Animals will fall if it gets too big.Then you'll get score(-regard to the specie of the animal)

But you'll lose score(-3) when animals finish one complete circle.(the snake is the ref)

The queue's speed is depending on the animations' weight on its two sides.

Balance the animals' weight distribution and get as mush score as you can.

It's my first GameJam project.Hope you have fun with it!.
